Name: Jakiro
Bio: Even among magical beasts, a twin-headed dragon is a freak. Equal parts ice and fire, cunning and rage, the creature known as Jakiro glides over charred and ice-bound battlefields, laying waste to any who would bear arms against it. Pyrexae dragon clutches always contain two fledglings. Famous for their viciousness even from the first moments of life, newly hatched dragons of this species will try to kill their sibling while still in the nest. Only the strongest survive. In this way is the strength of the Pyrexae line ensured. By some accident of nature, the freak Jakiro hatches from a single egg, combining in a single individual the full range of abilities found within the diverse Pyrexae species. Trapped within the armature of its monstrous body, the powers of ice and fire combine, and now no enemy is safe.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
Abilities.notes:
Can hit units up to 1025 range away.
Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath.
Abilities.attribute:
START RADIUS: 225
END RADIUS: 275
MOVE SLOW: 28% / 32% / 36% / 40%
ATTACK SLOW: 28 / 32 / 36 / 40
DURATION: 5
Abilities.lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
Abilities.notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.
Abilities.attribute:
FORMATION DELAY: 0.5
RADIUS: 150
DAMAGE: 50
PATH DURATION: 1/1.5/2/2.5
Abilities.lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
Abilities.desc: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.
Abilities.notes: Works on both units and buildings.
Abilities.attribute:
ATTACK SLOW: 30 / 40 / 50 / 60
RADIUS: 300
BURN DAMAGE: 12 / 16 / 20 / 24
DURATION: 5 / 5 / 5 / 5
Abilities.lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc:
Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Abilities.notes: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.
Abilities.attribute:
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 100 / 140 / 180
FLAME LENGTH: 1400
FLAME WIDTH: 260
DURATION: 10
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER SECOND: 125 / 175 / 225
SCEPTER FLAME LENGTH: 1800
SCEPTER DURATION: 30
Abilities.lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
